title: Snoop, Sports & Politics
description: Cari Champion discusses how the world of sports has become unavoidably political in recent weeks and talks about how that's okay. Plus, a Thanksgiving chat with Snoop Dogg.

itunes:author: ESPN, ESPNW, Cari Champion
